column2: Kohl's Corp. owns and operates family-oriented department stores. The company is headquartered in Menomonee Falls, Wisconsin and currently employs 34,000 full-time employees. The firm operates approximately 1,154 Kohl's department stores, a Website (www.Kohls.com), approximately 12 FILA outlets, and approximately three Off-Aisle clearance centers. The firm's stores and Website sell moderately-priced private label and national brand apparel, footwear, accessories, beauty and home products. The firm's Website includes merchandise that is available in its stores, as well as merchandise that is available only online. The firm's merchandise mix includes both national brands and private brands that are available only at Kohl's. The firm's private brands include Apt. 9, Croft & Barrow, Jumping Beans, SO and Sonoma Goods for Life. The firm's exclusive brands include Food Network, Jennifer Lopez, Marc Anthony, Rock & Republic and Simply Vera Vera Wang.
